00042 class KVIRC_API KviKvsModuleRunTimeCall : public KviKvsRunTimeCall
00043 {
00044 protected:
00045         KviModule             * m_pModule;
00046 public:
00047         KviKvsModuleRunTimeCall(KviModule * pModule,
00048                                         KviKvsRunTimeContext * pContext,
00049                                         KviKvsVariantList * pParams)
00050                 : KviKvsRunTimeCall(pContext,pParams), m_pModule(pModule) {}
00051         ~KviKvsModuleRunTimeCall(){};
00052 public:
00053         KviModule * module(){ return m_pModule; };
00054 };

00066 class KVIRC_API KviKvsModuleCommandCall : public KviKvsModuleRunTimeCall
00067 {
00068 protected:
00069         KviKvsSwitchList * m_pSwitchList;
00070 public:
00071         KviKvsModuleCommandCall(KviModule * pModule,
00072                                         KviKvsRunTimeContext * pContext,
00073                                         KviKvsVariantList * pParams,
00074                                         KviKvsSwitchList * pSwitches)
00075                 : KviKvsModuleRunTimeCall(pModule,pContext,pParams), m_pSwitchList(pSwitches){};
00076         ~KviKvsModuleCommandCall(){};
00077 public:
00078         KviKvsSwitchList * switches(){ return m_pSwitchList; };
00079         KviKvsSwitchList * switchList(){ return m_pSwitchList; };
00080 
00081         // forwarders for the switch list
00082         bool hasSwitch(unsigned short u,const QString &szSwitch){ return (m_pSwitchList->find(u,szSwitch) != 0); };
00083         KviKvsVariant * getSwitch(unsigned short u,const QString &szSwitch){ return m_pSwitchList->find(u,szSwitch); };
00084 };

00086 class KVIRC_API KviKvsModuleCallbackCommandCall : public KviKvsModuleCommandCall
00087 {
00088 protected:
00089         const KviKvsScript     * m_pCallback;
00090         KviKvsTreeNodeDataList * m_pParameterDataList; // core subtree that rappresents the parameter list
00091 public:
00092         KviKvsModuleCallbackCommandCall(KviModule * pModule,
00093                                         KviKvsRunTimeContext * pContext,
00094                                         KviKvsVariantList * pParams,
00095                                         KviKvsSwitchList * pSwitches,
00096                                         const KviKvsScript * pCallback,
00097                                         KviKvsTreeNodeDataList * pDataList)
00098                 : KviKvsModuleCommandCall(pModule,pContext,pParams,pSwitches), m_pCallback(pCallback), m_pParameterDataList(pDataList) {};
00099         ~KviKvsModuleCallbackCommandCall(){};
00100 public:
00101         // Never NULL, but may have empty code
00102         const KviKvsScript * callback(){ return m_pCallback; };
00103         virtual bool getParameterCode(unsigned int uParamIdx,QString &szParamBuffer);
00104 };

00133 class KVIRC_API KviKvsModuleInterface
00134 {
00135         friend class KviKvsModuleManager;
00136 public:
00137         KviKvsModuleInterface();
00138         ~KviKvsModuleInterface();
00139 protected:
00140         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsModuleSimpleCommandExecRoutine>         * m_pModuleSimpleCommandExecRoutineDict;
00141         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsModuleFunctionExecRoutine>              * m_pModuleFunctionExecRoutineDict;
00142         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsModuleCallbackCommandExecRoutine>       * m_pModuleCallbackCommandExecRoutineDict;
00143 public:
00144         void kvsRegisterSimpleCommand(const QString &szCommand,KviKvsModuleSimpleCommandExecRoutine r);
00145         void kvsRegisterCallbackCommand(const QString &szCommand,KviKvsModuleCallbackCommandExecRoutine r);
00146         void kvsRegisterFunction(const QString &szFunction,KviKvsModuleFunctionExecRoutine r);
00147         bool kvsRegisterAppEventHandler(unsigned int iEventIdx,KviKvsModuleEventHandlerRoutine r);
00148         bool kvsRegisterRawEventHandler(unsigned int iRawIdx,KviKvsModuleEventHandlerRoutine r);
00149 
00150         void kvsUnregisterSimpleCommand(const QString &szCommand)
00151                 { m_pModuleSimpleCommandExecRoutineDict->remove(szCommand); };
00152         void kvsUnregisterCallbackCommand(const QString &szCommand)
00153                 { m_pModuleCallbackCommandExecRoutineDict->remove(szCommand); };
00154         void kvsUnregisterFunction(const QString &szFunction)
00155                 { m_pModuleFunctionExecRoutineDict->remove(szFunction); };
00156         void kvsUnregisterAppEventHandler(unsigned int iEventIdx);
00157         void kvsUnregisterRawEventHandler(unsigned int iRawIdx);
00158 
00159         void kvsUnregisterAllSimpleCommands()
00160                 { m_pModuleSimpleCommandExecRoutineDict->clear(); };
00161         void kvsUnregisterAllCallbackCommands()
00162                 { m_pModuleCallbackCommandExecRoutineDict->clear(); };
00163         void kvsUnregisterAllFunctions()
00164                 { m_pModuleFunctionExecRoutineDict->clear(); };
00165         void kvsUnregisterAllAppEventHandlers();
00166         void kvsUnregisterAllRawEventHandlers();
00167         void kvsUnregisterAllEventHandlers();
00168 
00169         KviKvsModuleSimpleCommandExecRoutine * kvsFindSimpleCommand(const QString &szCommand)
00170                 { return m_pModuleSimpleCommandExecRoutineDict->find(szCommand); };
00171         KviKvsModuleCallbackCommandExecRoutine * kvsFindCallbackCommand(const QString &szCommand)
00172                 { return m_pModuleCallbackCommandExecRoutineDict->find(szCommand); };
00173         KviKvsModuleFunctionExecRoutine * kvsFindFunction(const QString &szFunction)
00174                 { return m_pModuleFunctionExecRoutineDict->find(szFunction); };
00175 
00176         void completeCommand(const QString &cmd,KviPointerList<QString> * matches);
00177         void completeFunction(const QString &cmd,KviPointerList<QString> * matches);
00178         void getAllFunctionsCommandsModule(QStringList *list,QString &szModuleName);
00179 protected:
00180         void registerDefaultCommands();
00181 };

00214 #define KVSM_PARAMETER_IGNORED(a) KVS_PARAMETER_IGNORED(a)

00216 #define KVSM_PARAMETERS_BEGIN(pCall) \
00217         KVS_PARAMETERS_BEGIN(parameter_format_list)
00218 
00219 #define KVSM_PARAMETERS_END(pCall) \
00220         KVS_PARAMETERS_END \
00221         if(!KviKvsParameterProcessor::process(pCall->params(),pCall->context(),parameter_format_list))return false;

00223 #define KVSM_REQUIRE_CONNECTION(pCall) \
00224         if(!pCall->window()->context())return c->context()->errorNoIrcContext(); \
00225         if(!pCall->window()->connection())return c->context()->warningNoIrcConnection();
